description: We're meeting in advance of http://fosdem.org/ to get to know each other and show how we're using Ceph. The meeting will be at a walking distance from Grand Place and when we're done with geek stuff, we can go out and drink / eat nearby.
how_to_find_us: Follow the Procapital signs, it is an office space and someone will be there to welcome you
name: Before FOSDEM : Ceph users and developers
